org.wso2.carbon.repository.api.handlers

Class HandlerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.repository.api.handlers.HandlerContext

  • public class HandlerContext
extends Object
    Objects of this class contains the information about the current request to the repository. All attributes of such objects should be either null or should contain a *valid" value. That is, if an attribute contains a non-null value it is safe to assume that attribute contains a valid value as mentioned by the java doc of that attribute.

      Construct the request context.
